00038 #ifndef _STDINT_H_
00039 #define _STDINT_H_
00040 
00043 typedef unsigned char       uint8_t;   //8 bits
00047 typedef unsigned int      uint16_t;  //16 bits
00051 typedef unsigned long       uint32_t;  //32 bits
00055 typedef unsigned long long  uint64_t;  //64 bits
00056 
00060 typedef signed char         int8_t;    //8 bits
00064 typedef signed int        int16_t;   //16 bits
00068 typedef signed long         int32_t;   //32 bits
00072 typedef signed long long    int64_t;   //64 bits
00073

00076 
00078 typedef unsigned int uintptr_t;
00079 
00081 typedef signed int int_t;
